title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: August 18, 2023, 07:08:58 PMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 07:20:24 PM by minerjones
content: Up for auction are a few rare Genesis Coin Series 2 sets!!LOT 1: Set #11: Shiny Gold, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold, Antique Silver, Antique Copper, Antique Brass*This is 6 of the 7 coins in this set. Missing Shiny Silver*LOT 2: Set #27: Shiny Gold, Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold, Antique Silver, Antique Brass*This is 6 of the 7 coins in this set. Missing Antique Copper*LOT 3: Set #37: Shiny Gold, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold, Antique Silver, Antique Copper, Antique Brass*This is 6 of the 7 coins in this set. Missing Shiny Silver*LOT 4: Set #61: Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold*This is 3 of 3 coins for this set!! It is complete****There are still 5? (maybe 4) unaccounted for boxes according to my records. There were a total of 475 coins and still about 25 unaccounted for***There is one know box still available here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5321978.0Here is link to original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1489364The distribution for the coins were blind boxes that came 5 coins to a boxThis done in the style of sports cards and was meant to encourage trading amongst collectors to see if a complete set could be madeThere were a total of 100 sets of coins40 of the sets were 7-coin sets (#1 - #40) Shiny Gold, Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold, Antique Silver, Antique Copper, Antique Brass10 of the sets were 6-coin sets (#41 - #50) Shiny Gold, Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Silver, Antique Copper, Antique Brass10 of the sets were 4-coin sets (#51 - #60) Shiny Gold, Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Brass40 of the sets were 3-coin sets (#61-#100) Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique BrassSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0150MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 23rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: cool concept for selling coins to try and make them tradable.
